_backgroundRepeat.title: Repeat
_backgroundRepeat.description: Repeat-x: The background image is repeated only horizontally. Repeat-y: The background image is repeated only vertically

_backgroundSize.title: Size
_backgroundSize.description: Auto: The background image is displayed in its original size. Cover: Resize the background image to cover the entire container, even if it has to stretch or crop the image. Contain: Resize the background image to make sure the image is fully visible

_backgroundPosition.title: Position
_backgroundPosition.description: The first value is the horizontal position and the second value is the vertical
